short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to show code implementations from Papers with Code directly in Google Scholar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to present the number of available code implementions (via Papers With Code) for articles listed on Google Scholar and arXiv. Mostly relevant for researchers looking to optimize their working flow with Google Scholar and Papers With Code.
